商务汉英疑难杂词辨析与翻译_百度百科 ... 51【意外的利润？】 windfall profit 52【游览者？】 rubberneck 53【诱鸟？】 call bird.
Traffic was slowed by curious rubberneckers ., 交通由于好奇的围观者而减慢.

entry.tran: (尤指无礼地或傻乎乎地)观望，盯着看
entry.def: If someone is rubbernecking, they are staring at someone or something, especially in a rude or silly way.

example.ex: The accident was caused by people slowing down to rubber-neck.
example.tran: 事故是由为了看热闹而减速的人引起的。
